Description: trees that showed no evidence of past breakage were collected
Leaf area was determined with a scanner combined with an area-determination software.
It was defined as the geometric mean of the two stem diameters measured.
This was calculated as the projection of an ellipse defiend byt eh tow crown diameters.
trees were dried at 80 degrees for 1 week in an oven and their oven dry mass were measured.
Species with moderately shade tolerance for all
